choose.when: INSERT INTO NOTICE (user_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_file1, notice_file2, notice_file3, notice_file4, notice_file5, camp_no, camp_name) VALUE (#{writer.id}, #{noticeTitle:VARCHAR}, #{noticeContent:VARCHAR}, #{noticeFile1:VARCHAR},#{noticeFile2:VARCHAR},#{noticeFile3:VARCHAR}, #{noticeFile4:VARCHAR}, #{noticeFile5:VARCHAR},#{campNo:NUMERIC},#{campName:VARCHAR})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO NOTICE (user_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_file1, notice_file2, notice_file3, notice_file4, notice_file5) VALUE (#{writer.id}, #{noticeTitle:VARCHAR}, #{noticeContent:VARCHAR}, #{noticeFile1:VARCHAR},#{noticeFile2:VARCHAR},#{noticeFile3:VARCHAR}, #{noticeFile4:VARCHAR}, #{noticeFile5:VARCHAR})

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM NOTICE AS n JOIN USERS AS u ON n.user_id = u.user_id WHERE n.notice_no = #{value};

SELECT n.notice_no, n.user_id, n.delete_flag, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.view_count, n.reg_date, n.camp_no, n.camp_name, n.notice_file1, n.notice_file2, n.notice_file3,n.notice_file4, n.notice_file5, u.role, u.nick_name, u.password, u.name, u.addr, u.phone, u.entry_reg_date, u.bank, u.account_holder, u.account_num, u.having_point, u.camp_call, u.entry_approval_flag, u.receive_cancel_total_count, u.receive_ban_end_date, u.dormant_reg_date, u.secession_reg_date, u.suspension_reg_date, u.suspension_content, u.auction_grade FROM NOTICE n JOIN USERS u ON n.user_id = u.user_id WHERE n.delete_flag = 'N'
n.camp_no = #{campNo}
n.camp_no IS NULL
MATCH (notice_title,notice_content) AGAINST (concat_ws(#{searchKeyword},'*','*') in boolean mode)
MATCH (notice_title) AGAINST (concat_ws(#{searchKeyword},'*','*') in boolean mode)
MATCH (notice_content) AGAINST (concat_ws(#{searchKeyword},'*','*') in boolean mode)
ORDER BY n.notice_no DESC LIMIT #{offset} , #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT n.notice_no, n.user_id, n.delete_flag, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.view_count, n.reg_date, n.camp_no, n.camp_name, n.notice_file1, n.notice_file2, n.notice_file3, n.notice_file4, n.notice_file5, u.role, u.nick_name, u.password, u.name, u.addr, u.phone, u.entry_reg_date, u.bank, u.account_holder, u.account_num, u.having_point, u.camp_call, u.entry_approval_flag, u.receive_cancel_total_count, u.receive_ban_end_date, u.dormant_reg_date, u.secession_reg_date, u.suspension_reg_date, u.suspension_content, u.auction_grade FROM NOTICE n JOIN USERS u ON n.user_id = u.user_id WHERE n.delete_flag = 'N'
n.camp_no = #{campNo}
n.camp_no IS NULL
MATCH (notice_title,notice_content) AGAINST (concat_ws(#{searchKeyword},'*','*') in boolean mode)
MATCH (notice_title) AGAINST (concat_ws(#{searchKeyword},'*','*') in boolean mode)
MATCH (notice_content) AGAINST (concat_ws(#{searchKeyword},'*','*') in boolean mode)
ORDER BY n.reg_date) countTable
